attributes.action: Give ex Royal Navy sailors who served in the 2nd World War, their medals free of charge
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ex Royal Navy sailors are being asked for at minimum £40 per medal they earned during the hostilities of the 2nd World War. These brave men and women risked their lives just as much as the other 2 armed forces who received their Medals free of charge. It is a very great insult, when they receive a letter from the MOD telling them they were awarded medals but can't have them unless they pay, to them the equvalent of half a weeks pension for each. The cooks and deckhands in the Merchant Navy recieved theirs free, so why the discrimination.
